Ender Arrow: Crafted with an Arrow and an Ender Pearl, works like an ender pearl, but goes farther, since it's an arrow, yay.
Explosive Arrow: Crafed with an Arrow and two pieces of Gunpowder, explodes where it hits.

Torch Arrow: Crafted with an arrow and a Torch, places a torch where it hits. If it can't, it stays there so it can be picked up.These can all be fired from dispensers, and will get used up even if the bow shooting them has Infinity.
This feature was introduced in Minecraft 1.10.
